DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect diet either high low glycemic index ( GI ) ad libitum ( free ) food intake , body weight , fat mass fat-free mass , risk marker diabetes cardiovascular disease , energy expenditure substrate oxidation 10 weeksÂ´ intake slightly overweight subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Experimental design Two match group give high-GI low-GI food diet throughout 10 week parallel design . A number measurement do , end 10 week ' intervention . Subjects A total 50 slightly overweight ( body mass index , BMI = 25-30 kg/m2 ) woman , 20-40 year age participate . Subjects randomize accord body weight , composition , age , sex physical activity level two match group . A representative subgroup 15 subject randomize diet group ( total 30 subject ) measurement energy expenditure substrate oxidation ventilate hood well postprandial blood sampling . Experimental diet Subjects eat diet intervention start perform 7-day weighed dietary record determination habitual food intake . At begin every 2 week 10 week ' intervention subject instruct consume low-fat ( < 30 E % ) , high-carbohydrate diet ( > 55 E % ) dietician . Subjects week give amount carbohydrate-rich food either high low GI instruction consume minimum amount every day . We aim control 75 % subject ' total carbohydrate intake . The exact amount test food eaten note every day subject use diary diet scale . Instructions food intake cooking recipe give dietician . A positive list negative list food item provide study group . Besides fixed minimum amount experimental food subject eat liberty . Another 7-d dietary record perform week 5 week 10 register ad libitum food intake . To validate dietary record 24-h urine sample take registration . Lithium also add experimental food week 4-5 follow compliance study . Measurements All subject : Week 0 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 measure body weight , fat mass fat-free mass use bio-electrical impedance.In week 0 10 measure body composition DEXA-scan , W/H-ratio sagittal height . Blood sample fast week 0 10 ( Glucose , insulin , triacylglycerol ( TAG ) , non-esterified fatty acid ( NEFA ) , leptin , T-cholesterol , LDL-chol , HDL-chol , fructosamine , glycated hemoglobin , GIP , GLP-1 , GLP-2 , ghrelin , factor VIIc , factor VIIb , PAI-1 , Apo A IV. ) . Blood pressure week 0 10 ( fast systolic diastolic BP heart rate ) . 24-h urine sample collect week 0 , 5 10 . Feces collect subgroup week 0 10 . Subgroup : Week 10 : Ventilated hood measurement fast 4-h postprandial energy expenditure substrate oxidation . Postprandial appetite score hunger , satiety , fullness , prospective consumption , desire something sweet , fatty . Postprandial blood sample 4 hour breakfast ( 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 , 240 min ) : Glucose , insulin , NEFA , TAG , leptin , glucagon , GIP , GLP-1 , GLP-2 , ghrelin , paracetamol . At 240 min : factor VIIbt , PAI-1 , Apo A IV .
DOC.criteria: healthy , slightly overweight ( body mass index , BMI = 2530 kg/m2 ) woman , premenopausal , nonalcoholic ( < 14 unit alcohol/w ) smoking , elite athlete , food allergy , pregnant , lactating , medication , blood donation 3 month , 3 month completion study
